com.vtls.opensource.oai
Class Provider

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
          java.util.Properties
              com.vtls.opensource.oai.Provider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>
public class Provider
extends Properties

A JDOM implementation of an OAI-PMH Provider "proxy". This class mearly provides a light API to a provider.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Chris Hall
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Provider

public Provider(String _baseURL)
         throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                IOException
Calls the main constructor with a false validation flag.

Parameters:
_baseURL - The baseURL of the remote provider.
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException - If the response doesn't come back as a well-formed XML Document.
IOException - If something goes wrong getting the response.

Provider

public Provider(String _baseURL,
                boolean _validation)
         throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                IOException
Constructor. Creates the builders, 'Identify's the remote provider, and initializes internal Properties.

Parameters:
_baseURL - The baseURL of the remote provider.
_validation - Whether or not we are to validate the responses.
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException - If the response doesn't come back as a well-formed XML Document or setting up of the validation environment fails.
IOException - If something goes wrong getting the response.

public org.jdom.Element listIdentifiers()
                                 throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                        IOException
Asks the remote provider to continue listing identifiers if it's already begun to do so.

Returns:
The 'verb' Element of the response or null if there is no resumptionToken.

org.jdom.JDOMException - If the response doesn't come back as a well-formed XML Document.

listIdentifiers

public org.jdom.Element listIdentifiers(String _from,
                                        String _until,
                                        String _metadataPrefix,
                                        String _set)
                                 throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                        IOException
Asks the remote provider to start listing identifiers using specified parameters.

Parameters:
_from - From when in time to start listing.
_until - Until when in time to stop listing.
_metadataPrefix - What metadata to list. (REQUIRED)
_set - From what set to list.
Returns:
The 'verb' Element of the response.
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException - If the response doesn't come back as a well-formed XML Document.
IOException - If something goes wrong getting the response.

format_date

public String format_date(String date_string)
                   throws ParseException
Returns a date as a String which conforms to the Provider's granularity.

Parameters:
date_string - The date String to be formatted.
Returns:
A properly formatted date String.
Throws:
